name: Firefox Edge Extended
description:
Extend for customized theme *Firefox Edge (Light & Dark)*

Copyright: A lots of Styles are copied from other user in userstyles.org

Include Styles: Speed Dial(New Tabs), Bookmarks Bar, Alert Box, Bookmark AutoHide, View Source FontSize

Notice: Please Install *Firefox Edge (Light & Dark)* or the other Edge Theme First!

注意：自用火狐主题，为保证口味最佳，请搭配 EDGE 火狐主题食用。
